QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_capacity.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_capacity.id as clr_capacity_key, odf_ca_clr_capacity.id as clarity_clr_capacity_key, odf_ca_clr_capacity.code as id, odf_ca_clr_capacity.name as name, odf_ca_clr_capacity.created_date as clarity_created_date, odf_ca_clr_capacity.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_capacity.odf_parent_id as inv_key, odf_ca_clr_capacity.vsm_allocation_pct as vsm_allocation_pct, odf_ca_clr_capacity.vsm_capacity_type as vsm_capacity_type_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'VSM_CAPACITY_GUARDRAIL' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_CODE = odf_ca_clr_capacity.vsm_capacity_type) as vsm_capacity_type_caption, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from odf_ca_clr_capacity odf_ca_clr_capacity inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
